meanings.definition: to act or behave in an ostentatious or showy manner
meanings.sent1: She ponces around the room, showing off her new dress.
meanings.sent2: He always ponces when he wants attention.
meanings.sent3: The peacock ponces proudly, displaying its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: The celebrity ponces on the red carpet, attracting all the cameras.
meanings.sent5: The magician ponces with flair, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: a person who is showy or ostentatious in their behavior
meanings.sent1: The rich ponce always flaunts his expensive belongings.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the biggest ponce in town.
meanings.sent3: The ponce in the group always makes a grand entrance.
meanings.sent4: The ponce at the party stole the spotlight with his flashy outfit.
meanings.sent5: Everyone stared at the ponce as he made a dramatic gesture.

meanings.definition: characterized by ostentatious or showy behavior
meanings.sent1: Her ponce style always turns heads wherever she goes.
meanings.sent2: The ponce decorations in the room were extravagant.
meanings.sent3: The ponce car drew attention with its shiny exterior.
meanings.sent4: The ponce house on the hill sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The ponce outfit she wore was the talk of the town.
